info.title: AFAS SB API
info.description: AFAS SB API for integrating with the accounting software for accountants and entrepreneurs.

subdomein.description: URL unique for the accounting office.

post.summary: Get an access token for a scope.
Provide a manual created app token to get an access token.
Get scopes: Provide an identity token returned by the 'AccessToken' api.

get.summary: Retrieve a specific blob by UUID
get.description: Retrieve a specific blob by UUID

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the blob

put.description:
This operation consists of two requests. First call this endpoint with the Blob-* headers, without body to prepare the blob. Then call this endpoint without the Blob-* headers with a body to upload the file.

The blob UUID must be generated client side.

parameters.name: Blob-Content-Length
parameters.description: Length in bytes

parameters.name: Blob-Content-Type
parameters.description: File type

parameters.name: Blob-Content-FileName
parameters.description: ExampleBlobFile.pdf

parameters.name: Blob-Upload-Type
parameters.description: blob

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the blob. This should be generated client side.

updateconnector-bankaccount-1.0-create_r.description: Use this endpoint to create a new bankaccount data for a person or organisation.

AdministrationId.description: The Administration ID uniquely identifying an administration. Retrieve it from the endpoint: api/administration

Description.description: The description providing information about the cash mutation and other bookings

Date.description: The date when the cash mutation and other bookings occurred

LedgerAccountId.description: The Ledger Account ID uniquely identifying a ledger account. Retrieve it from the endpoint: api/ledgeraccounts

AmountIncludingVat.description: The amount including VAT for the cash mutation and other bookings

VatPercentage.description: The percentage of VAT applied to the cash mutation and other bookings

VatType.description: The type of VAT operation - 'purchase' or 'sales'

Attachments.description: Use the blob endpoint to create a Attachment. Fill the guid of the attachment.

updateconnector-cashmutation-2.0-create_.description: This endpoint allows you to add cash mutations directly from Point of Sale (POS) applications to the accounting software, streamlining the process of recording and managing cash transactions for businesses. For each cashmutation an request must be done.

AdministrationId.description: Required field containing the guid of the administation. This value can be received through a Get Administration request

EmailAddress.description: The emailaddress is set to default communication emailaddress for sending invoices

BankAccountNumber.description: Must be in IBAN format. Creates a bankaccount record for the customer

BIC.description: If the Bic code is not available the BIC code will be looked up. If its not found an error will be raised

PaymentMethod.description: Set default value for customer. Falls back to customer default when empty.

PaymentConditionId.description: Set default value for customer. Payment condition guids can be requested with the PaymentCondition Get endpoint. Falls back to default when empty.

CompanyIdCoc.description: Contains the CompanyCode also known in dutch as KVK nummer

CompanyIdVat.description: Contains the VAT code of the customer

TradeName.description: The formal trade name of the organisation. If empty will be filled with the field Name

sortField.name: sortField
sortField.description: The field by which you want to sort the results, along with the optional sort direction (ascending or descending). The format should be 'fieldId [direction]', where 'fieldId' is the ID of the field and 'direction' is either 'ascending' or 'descending'. If the direction is not specified, the default is 'ascending'.

trackingtoken.name: TrackingToken
trackingtoken.description: Get all changed items after this token.

tracking-identifier.name: Tracking-Identifier
tracking-identifier.description: Add your own uuid to the request and ensure that the request only gets processed once. The uuid must be unique for each request. The response will be the same as the first response.

accept-version.name: Accept-Version
accept-version.description: Use the sequence number of the endpoint.
